description.admin_list: Create new courses and include new trainers, edit courses and modify their content, review the performance and progress of students in the courses, supervise discussions and the educational community, create digital products of all kinds, such as advisory sessions and others, delete and stop displaying courses or products

description.general_manager_list: Can access everything in your platform Can assign and change user roles Can't transfer or control account ownership Can't set up payment integrations, customize platform pages and domain
